summary:
A quick re-tex of the default vampire eye\'s for humans and elves.
Dawnguard friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Vampire eye retexture by Maedhros the 6th


Just a quick re-texture from Bethesda\'s default vampire eye texture for humans and elves to something a bit different.

8/26/2012 - New Dawnguard friendly version with slight glow effect added. If you have the expansion grab the latest file.

Note: This doesn\'t alter the eyes for Argonian or Khajiit vampire\'s. Unlike Oblivion, they appear to have their own.


Installation:

Method 1: Extract the .dds files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data 
               
Extract the .nif files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data - DG version only

Make sure to keep the file structure intact.

Method 2: Drag the textures and meshes folders within this rar and drop it here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Method 3: Use the NMM

Overwrite if prompted.

Have fun!
author: Maedhros the 6th
